title: Advanced Course on Cursive Arabic Script Recognition Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic machine learning comprehension and foundational knowledge of CNN architectures
context.additional_context: An advanced course exploring practical handwriting recognition technology, where learners are expected to have prior experience in data preprocessing and deep learning model implementation.

learning_goals: Students can explain the design principles of CNN-based handwritten Arabic character classification models
Students can apply augmentation techniques to address data imbalance issues
Students can evaluate model performance using cross-validation and statistical testing
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
